fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use a potion on another player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When using a potion, you may choose to heal your target, learn their role, or attack them. Each choice has a two-night cooldown unless you have the Necronomicon. Each cooldown ends when you gain the Necronomicon.
